metadata.ground_truth: The review by a customer who ordered Red Curry said the food was excellent, affordable, and had large portions. Would you like to try them?
metadata.predicted: Yes, Sala Thong does serve Red Curry. It's one of the highlights of the restaurant and is very affordable. Would you like to know more?

conversation.content: Can you help me find and expensive Thai restaurant?
Sala Thong is an expensive Thai restaurant on the west side. Would you like to book there?
I'd like a place that has Red Curry at reasonable prices. Does Sala Thong have it?
Yes, Sala Thong does serve Red Curry. It's one of the highlights of the restaurant and is very affordable. Would you like to know more?

That won't work; I already told you I need a Red Curry at a reasonable price, not another pricey "highlight."  
If Sala Thong won't give solid price details and distance from my hotel, we already went over thisâ€”please name a couple of other budget Thai options nearby. <END> bye
